title: American Airlines and US Airways - key figures 2015
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Key area, and Unnamed: 1 in each Key area on the y axis.
Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) has the highest Unnamed: 1 and Number of countries served has the lowest Unnamed: 1.

max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Key area, and Unnamed: 1 in each Key area on the y axis.
The Unnamed: 1 is appeared to be the highest at Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) and lowest at Key area Number of countries served.
Key area Revenue passenger kilometers (in millions) has the second highest value for Unnamed: 1.

Unnamed: 1 at Key area Available seat kilometres (in millions) is 427533.0 , second place is Revenue passenger kilometers (in millions) at 350627.0, and thirdly is Number of daily departures at 6985.0.
The average Unnamed: 1 in all 7 Key areas is 112432.61.
